scripts.docs: npm run make:api && npm run make:docs && http-server -p 8000 docs
scripts.make:api: jsdoc2md --configure jsdoc.json --files types/*.js schemata/*.js services/*.js settings/deprecations.js README.md > API.md
scripts.report:install:
rm -rf node_modules && echo "
" > package-lock.json && echo "$ npm i" > reports/install.log && npm i >> reports/install.log
